article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YYQETX hentry entry story-marquee-standard

h2.a: Nobody Knows What to Do With The World’s Fastest Internet Service

div.p: When you have an internet service that lets you download at speeds over one gigabyte per second, what exactly do you do with it?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YYQETX&via=Digg&text=Nobody Knows What to Do With The World’s Fastest Internet Service

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZG8bBH hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: NASA: Mars Once Had 'Some Of The Key Chemical Ingredients For Life'

div.p: NASA's Mars Curiosity rover drilled into a rock and found that it contained a clay-like material. That's the news. The implication is much larger: Mars may once have had an environment hospitable to life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZG8bBH&via=Digg&text=NASA: Mars Once Had 'Some Of The Key Chemical Ingredients For Life'

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZFs35P hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Paranoid Dictator's Communist-Era Bunkers Now A National Nuisance

div.p: In Albania, 750,000 Communist-era bunkers populate the landscape, relics of the paranoia and skewed priorities of former dictator Enver Hoxha. Now they exist as quirky homes, animal shelters, ad hoc storage and make-out spots.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZFs35P&via=Digg&text=Paranoid Dictator's Communist-Era Bunkers Now A National Nuisance

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YjiVVa hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Welcome To Facebook's Midlife Crisis

div.p: Facebook's most important feature, its social graph, is getting old. And it's not clear the company knows what to do about it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YjiVVa&via=Digg&text=Welcome To Facebook's Midlife Crisis

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZwQCR5 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Most Popular Porn Searches In Different Countries And States

div.p: The below interactive infographic shows the top 10 most commonly searched terms on porn sites over a 6 month period. You can check out every state in the U.S. and then see what other countries around the world are searching for.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZwQCR5&via=Digg&text=Most Popular Porn Searches In Different Countries And States

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Yob1H3 hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: TELL THEM IT'S BETTER THAN SEX OFFENDERS

h2.a: How To Get A Community To Accept Nuclear Waste

div.p: How could you possibly convince a community to accept nuclear waste in its back yard? Hints: Deal with them honestly, don’t cram it down their throats, and certainly don’t pay them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yob1H3&via=Digg&text=How To Get A Community To Accept Nuclear Waste

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10BMUYR hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: ARE YOU SMARTER THAN A 5TH GRADER?

h2.a: What Is The Answer To That Stupid Math Problem On Facebook?

div.p: Perhaps you thought, “Duh! That’s easy,” and then became embroiled in an epically long comment thread while your blood pressure steadily rose because you could not possibly understand why the others doing this problem could not get the right answer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10BMUYR&via=Digg&text=What Is The Answer To That Stupid Math Problem On Facebook?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZG06L0 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Gum Helps You Think

div.p: Need to concentrate? Pop a stick of gum into your mouth.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZG06L0&via=Digg&text=Gum Helps You Think

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YYXmJA hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Ewald-Heinrich Von Kleist, Who Plotted To Kill Hitler, Dies

div.p: Von Kleist, a former German army lieutenant, first volunteered to wear a suicide vest in 1944. He was scheduled to meet Hitler to model a new uniform and that's when he would detonate.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YYXmJA&via=Digg&text=Ewald-Heinrich Von Kleist, Who Plotted To Kill Hitler, Dies

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZFLHk9 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Charge Your Phone By Sending A Text Message

div.p: At first glance, the title might sound to be an oxymoron of sorts. After all, if your cellphone is already low on power, why bother to use up more energy by sending a text message? Perhaps an explanation is in order.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZFLHk9&via=Digg&text=Charge Your Phone By Sending A Text Message

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-W6IPgh hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Do Looks Matter When You're Picking A Pope?

div.p: Could analysis of the faces of the papal candidates predict who the next pope will be?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W6IPgh&via=Digg&text=Do Looks Matter When You're Picking A Pope?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WkpNlv hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Gang Behavior On The Internet

div.p: A study on the differences in Internet use among gang members and non-members fills a gap in the research about online crime.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WkpNlv&via=Digg&text=Gang Behavior On The Internet

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YXBRWG hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: How The Humble Telephone Is About To Bring Internet To The Masses

div.p: Recall the last decade, when the country moved from analog to all-digital television. What’s happening now in telephony is a lot like that, only customers won’t have to lift a finger to experience its benefits.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YXBRWG&via=Digg&text=How The Humble Telephone Is About To Bring Internet To The Masses

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10BGnNF hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Photos Of Japan's Recent Volcano Eruption

div.p: German photographer Martin Rietze caught a series of spectacularly breathtaking shots of a volcano, shrouded in flying lava and electrifying lightning, erupting in southern Kyushu, Japan.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10BGnNF&via=Digg&text=Photos Of Japan's Recent Volcano Eruption

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZGxgtY hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Water Defeats Soda As America’s Favorite Beverage

div.p: Americans are now drinking an average of 58 gallons of water a year, compared to only 44 gallons of soda. This might seem like a blow to big soft drink companies, but since this is America it’s unlikely that big business will take a backseat to consumer health choices.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZGxgtY&via=Digg&text=Water Defeats Soda As America’s Favorite Beverage

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Xo30IC hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Gold Is The Worst Investment Of 2013

div.p: John Paulson is getting killed by it. George Soros is dumping it. Gold has turned into the dog of the global markets.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xo30IC&via=Digg&text=Gold Is The Worst Investment Of 2013

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZG3Mi3 hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: How To Choose The Perfect Seat

div.p: Designer Alex Cornell helps you figure out how to choose the best seat, or at least “how not to get stuck next to someone that sucks,” with this helpful infographic.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZG3Mi3&via=Digg&text=How To Choose The Perfect Seat

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XkY6vZ hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: ROBIN WILLIAMS SHAVES CHEST FOR ROLE

h2.a: Disney Is Making A Live-Action 'Beauty And The Beast'

div.p: Hot on the heels of another splashy revisionist fairy tale opening in "Oz The Great and Powerful," Disney is in talks with UK-based writer Joe Ahearne to reinvent its "Beauty And The Beast" franchise.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XkY6vZ&via=Digg&text=Disney Is Making A Live-Action 'Beauty And The Beast'

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WkUPKf hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Does Food Taste Any Different In Space?

div.p: Everyone's favorite Canadian astronaut/YouTube sensation is back to explain how food tastes in space. The answer: different! Sort of.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WkUPKf&via=Digg&text=Does Food Taste Any Different In Space?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10zenKC hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: NEVER TOLD HIM HE LOVED HIM

h2.a: My Father, The Hate Preacher

div.p: Pastor Fred Phelps, whose bizarre protests have made his tiny Westboro Baptist Church reviled around the world, has a terrifying hold over his congregation. But one escapee is now Fred’s fiercest critic – his own son.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10zenKC&via=Digg&text=My Father, The Hate Preacher

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-13TOOZH hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: In Honor Of St. Patrick's Day: Ten Outstanding Irish Whiskeys That Aren’t Jameson

div.p: Although all of the Irish whiskeys currently on the market start life in one of just three distilleries — Midleton, Cooley, and Bushmills — the range of labels offers plenty of opportunities to get your craic on with something new.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13TOOZH&via=Digg&text=In Honor Of St. Patrick's Day: Ten Outstanding Irish Whiskeys That Aren’t Jameson

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZxvmKR hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: WILL BEAT YOU AT WORDS WITH FRIENDS

h2.a: Meet The Master Anagrammist

div.p: Cory Calhoun is a natural anagrammist: presented with a series of letters, he shuffles them to form new words.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZxvmKR&via=Digg&text=Meet The Master Anagrammist

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZxoKMJ hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: HOW TO AVOID 50 SHADES OF GRAY

h2.a: Vatican Smoke Signals: The Science Behind The Smoke

div.p: White smoke indicates that a new pope has been chosen, while black smoke signifies no decision. But where does the color come from?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZxoKMJ&via=Digg&text=Vatican Smoke Signals: The Science Behind The Smoke

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-13TE9y8 hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: HOW TO GET RID OF YOUR PETS

h2.a: Mini Black Holes Easier To Make Than Thought

div.p: Creating microscopic black holes using particle accelerators requires less energy than previously thought, researchers say.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13TE9y8&via=Digg&text=Mini Black Holes Easier To Make Than Thought

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WZzOSv hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: THE OBITUARY TO END ALL OBITUARIES

h2.a: You Didn't Know This Dead Man, But You'll Wish You Did

div.div: Good read: bradfordokeefe.com/obituar... "He particularly hated Day Light Saving Time, which he referred to as The Devil’s Time." RIP Harry Stamps.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WZzOSv&via=Digg&text=You Didn't Know This Dead Man, But You'll Wish You Did

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-13QSKdo hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Your Moral Decisions Are Shaped By A Bad Mood

div.p: Weighty choices can be shifted by surprising factors.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13QSKdo&via=Digg&text=Your Moral Decisions Are Shaped By A Bad Mood

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YYfAuR hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Google Launches 'Help For Hacked Sites'

div.p: Google launched its new “Help for Hacked Sites” series to teach webmasters how to avoid getting hacked in the first place – and how to recover their sites if it happens anyway.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YYfAuR&via=Digg&text=Google Launches 'Help For Hacked Sites'

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Y5lQys hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: NOT THE MOST OUTRAGEOUS THING HE'S DONE

h2.a: Ahmadinejad Under Fire For Touching Chavez's Mother

div.p: Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad is mired in a fresh controversy over both real and fake photos showing him consoling the grieving family members of late Venezuelan President Hugo Chavez.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y5lQys&via=Digg&text=Ahmadinejad Under Fire For Touching Chavez's Mother

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZERNzi hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Can This Taco Save America?

div.p: Taco Bell sold a million Doritos Tacos Locos a day last year—and hired 15,000 new people. Here's how the chain’s most bizarre meal yet is upending American economics.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZERNzi&via=Digg&text=Can This Taco Save America?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10ytJzd hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Radioactive Man

div.p: In the small town of Tomioka, less than six miles away from the Fukushima Daiichi plant, one man refused to leave: Naoto Matsumura, a 53-year-old fifth-generation rice farmer who is surely the most stubborn man in Japan, if not the world.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10ytJzd&via=Digg&text=Radioactive Man

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZF9u3Z hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: WATCH THIS, NOT THAT CAT VIDEO

h2.a: Liberated Research Chimps See The Sky For The First Time

div.p: Chimp Haven, the sanctuary for retired biomedical research chimps, has released a moving video that shows government research chimps as they go out into the simulated wild for the very first time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZF9u3Z&via=Digg&text=Liberated Research Chimps See The Sky For The First Time
